/>
VIII.i.3.C.6.a
.
Requirement for Conception During or After Qualifying Service
To be eligible for Chapter 18 benefits, the individual must have been conceived after the date on which the Veteran-parent first had qualifying service in RVN, Korea, or Thailand.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C - Eligibility and Development
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C
